sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a blight
, povzroči hude težave in nekaj poškoduje ali pokvari.

seg.quote: We think of pollution as a modern blight, but it is not.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
blights one's life or expectations
, poškoduje ali pokvari življenje ali pričakovanja tistega človeka.

seg.quote: Her career has been blighted by clashes with the authorities.
